header.customCSS: background: linear-gradient(rgba(0,0,0,0.4), rgba(0,0,0,0.4)), url('white-out.webp') center/cover; box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.3); text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.7);

options.title: The Waffle Shop
options.desc: üö® IMPORTANT: Go here on Friday! It will be too busy on Saturday/Sunday with all the game day crowds. Try the famous Strawberry Waffles or Chocolate Chip Pancakes.

options.title: Hike Mount Nittany
options.desc: Classic Penn State experience! Take in the stunning views of campus and the valley from the Mike Lynch Overlook. Perfect way to work up an appetite.

options.title: Evening Option A: Local Whiskey
options.desc: End the day with a huge selection of whiskeys and upscale pub food. Great atmosphere to get in the game day spirit! Leaves the evening open to barhop around downtown afterward.

options.title: Evening Option B: Champs North Atherton
options.desc: Sports bar with wings, burgers, and a lively atmosphere. Perfect for getting into the game day mood with fellow fans!

options.title: Bagel Love Cafe
options.desc: üç≥ Pro tip: You can get delivery! Start your game day with fresh bagels and breakfast sandwiches without leaving your room.

options.title: ESPN College GameDay
options.desc:
üìç Old Main Lawn, University Park
Fan pit opens at 6:30 AM ET - arrive early! Experience the excitement and energy of College GameDay live from Penn State.

options.title: Tailgate & Pre-Game
options.desc: Join the legendary Penn State tailgating scene! Get your white gear ready and soak in the atmosphere before the big game.

options.title: Visit Mike in Lot 16
options.desc:
üìç Football Lot 16 (Orange A East Opp)
Stop by and say hi to Mike at his tailgate spot!
